rankCard.maxRankDescription: You've reached the highest rank in the system

referralCode.title: Your Referral Code
referralCode.infoMessage: Earn commissions when your referrals make deposits and build their network

empty.title: No commissions yet
empty.subtitle: Start inviting friends to earn daily commissions

hero.title: AI-Powered Earnings
hero.description: Your investment is managed by our advanced AI agent that generates consistent high returns through intelligent market strategies.

step1.title: 1. Invest Your Balance
step1.description: Keep funds invested to earn daily dividends. The more you invest, the higher your rank and daily earnings.

step2.title: 2. Build Your Network
step2.description: Invite people to join. Each active referral helps you climb ranks and unlock higher commission rates.

step3.title: 3. Earn Daily Dividends
step3.description: Receive automatic daily payments based on your rank. Higher ranks = higher percentage returns on your investment.

ranks.title: Rank Benefits
ranks.recruit: Entry level - Start earning 0.35% daily with $100 invested
ranks.bronze: 3 directs + $500 invested + $2,500 lifetime network volume - Earn 1.05% daily
ranks.silver: 5 directs + $2,000 invested + $30,000 lifetime network volume - Earn 1.80% daily
ranks.gold: 8 directs + $5,000 invested + $150,000 lifetime network volume - Earn 2.60% daily

ai.title: AI Trading Agent
ai.description: Our proprietary AI analyzes markets 24/7, executing high-probability trades to generate consistent returns for all investors. The more you invest and the higher your rank, the more you earn.

keyPoints.title: Key Points
keyPoints.point1: Daily dividends are paid automatically based on your invested balance and rank
keyPoints.point2: To maintain your rank, keep the required investment amount active
keyPoints.point3: The AI works for you 24/7 - higher ranks unlock exponentially higher daily earnings

maintenance.title: Monthly Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: To keep your rank, you need to meet these requirements every month:

recruit.title: No Monthly Requirements!
recruit.description: Invest $100 once and earn 0.35% daily forever. No need to do anything else.

maintenance.note: Network volume = your deposits + deposits from your direct and indirect referrals
maintenance.warning: If you don't meet the requirements, you will be downranked immediately

monthlyMaintenance.volumeExplanation: This is the total deposits made by YOU + your entire network (directs + indirects) during the current month
